author: A_Brickset_user
review: This set looks very good.  Not many overlarge pieces and a nice array of slopes and wedges.  I hope that those prints are stickers- if they were printed, they would severly limit the use of many parts.  But otherwise, a nice set.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great little car
review: This set is just so fun to play with. Nice touch with the printed bricks and the accompanying stickers (this time with actual company names instead of color blocks) and the details on the minifig is too cool!

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Cool looking F1 car!
review:
For the price, this set is incredible! Nice shape and cool colors, this set is excellent to play with and is fab just looking at it. The details are excellent, eventhough they are mstly stickers. I normally don't like stickers on Lego sets, but it works here. How can you have a F1 car without the myriad of logos of the supporting companies? 

A must buy, considering it is only $12.99!

author: Xwing250
title: Exellent set!
review: This Williams BMW is totally cool! I dont usually like stickers on lego sets, but on this set it really looks well. The detail on Ralph Shumacher/Juan Pablo Montoya is really class! Over all i really do like this set and id recomend it to anybody!

author: modena
title: Not that nice.
review:
This wasn't the best set I got, but the minifigure is quite nice. I even gave him a name!

Pros:

  • Nice colours!
  • Pull-back motor!
  • Great minifigure!

Cons:

  • Stickers fall off easily.
  • Not much to play with.

Overall:

This was a satisfactory set. The very big problem was that with the years, the stickers fall off. I had to order new bricks to replace some bricks with some parts of old stickers on them.

If you really want this set, think twice. And if you do buy it, and you want to keep it out for the next 5 years or so, then don't glue on the stickers!
